author: schone_wizard
content: Is there any EIP suggesting a special op with reduced gas fee for bridging ETH into L2?

author: protolambda
content: It is called “LOG” and already exists, except the data is very painful to verify. I think L2 needs the SSZ receipts EIP for this to improve.

author: schone_wizard
content: I think that would be pretty beneficial if transferring eth to (and maybe from) an L2 chain could become more enshrined and more free. Otherwise you find yourself in stupid situations where you need to switch between L2s because your transaction partner A accepts only Optimism and transaction partner B accepts only Arbitrum and you need to pay $80 fees to move $20 between the chains
